title: Getting There App
description: React Native (iOS, iPad & Android) mobile app for specialized transportation services in the Denver metro area serving persons with disabilities and the elderly.

title: Artist Portfolio
description: Simple and elegantly designed portfolio built for the well know artist and sculpter, Jonathon Rajewski.  Built with vanilla JS, CSS & HTML in ReactJS.

title: IOT Controller
description: IOT temperature controler built with Node.js Express.js and ReactJS. Running on a Pi Zero to Control the temperature of a 527 gallon hot water tank remotely at Spangalang Brewery.

title: hyperlocal
description: Built with ReactJS, Auth0 and BULMA. Platform with user accounts and Authentication for people to connect with each other within their neighborhoods.

title: BeerKan
description: Digital beer brewing log built with Materialize, Heroku, Express.js Sequelize, and Node.js.  Works like a Kan Ban board for brewing beer.

title: Docker Boto-3
description: Test and copy the contents from one AWS s3 bucket into another s3 bucker using a PYTHON app containerized with DOCKER.

title: React Book Search
description: ReactJS, Node, BULMA, Express, MongoDB, Google Books API - Users can search and save books to review or purchase later.

title: Liri Node app
description: LIRI is a command line NODE.js app that takes in parameters and gives you back data. LIRI will search Spotify for songs, Bands in Town for concerts, and OMDB for movies.

title: Eat Da Burger
description: MYSQL, Handlebars.js, Heroku - Name a burger then eat it!

title: React Clicky Game
description: Memory card game built with ReactJS.

title: Friend-Finder
description: Node.js, Express, Bootstrap - Friend matching app.

title: Camp With confidence
description: Uses API's to search for a campsite in any National park and get a weather forecast for that site.

title: Train-Scheduler
description: Train scheduling interface build with ReactJS and HandlebarsJS.

title: Gif Tastic App
description: Gify API, Javascript, JQuery, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap - Search and save your favorite gifs.

title: node-word-guess
description: Node, Javascript, Inquirer.js - Node CLI word guess game using Javascript Constructors.

title: Bamazon-store
description: NODE.js and MySQL inventory control for a fake store called 'Bamazon'.

title: Beer Trivia Game
description: Javascript, HTML and CSS - Test your Beer knowledge with this multiple choice Beer Trivia.

title: Word Guess Game
description: Javascripts, HTML and CSS - Word guess game with Adventure Time characters.

title: Magic Eight Ball
description: Javascript, HTML, CSS - Its an 8 ball, ask anyting.
